hibernate-mapping.query: select a from Action a, BusinessEntity be where be.Application.Id = :applicationId and a.BusinessEntity.Id = be.Id
from Action a inner join fetch a.RequestMap inner join fetch a.ResponseMap where a.Id = :actionId

select a from Action a where a.BusinessEntity.Application.Id = :applicationId and a.Id not in ( select sm.MappedToAction.Id from Service s inner join s.ServiceMethods sm where s.Application.Id = :applicationId )

from Action a left outer join fetch a.StoredProcedure left outer join fetch a.Query where a.Name like :actionName and a.BusinessEntity.Name like :entityName and a.BusinessEntity.Application.Id = :applicationId
from Action a where a.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId or a.ResponseMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select a from ServiceMethod sm, Action a where sm.Id = :serviceMethodId and sm.MappedToAction.Id = a.Id
